title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Virtual Grocery Shopping (VGS) Through Consumer Learning Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical analysis and consumer behavior theory
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model the impact of consumer technology readiness (TR), perceived ease of use (PEOU), and learning optimization strategies on the intention to adopt VGS.
Learners can classify consumer segments based on Canadian market cases and propose tailored marketing strategies for each group.
Learners can analyze and interpret actual survey data using structural equation modeling (SEM) techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
